DOC.brief_summary: Title study : Auricular acupuncture ( AA ) pre-exam anxiety : A blinded randomize crossover study healthy volunteer Study period : 04/2012 - 07/2012 Institution : Department Anesthesiology Intensive Care Medicine University Medicine Greifswald Aim study : To investigate anxiolytic effect auricular acupuncture ( AA ) comparison placebo acupuncture intervention oral exam anatomy University Greifswald Design : Prospective blind randomize crossover trial Intervention : 1 . AA use indwell fix needle , retain 24 h situ 2 . AA use placebo needle Number volunteer : N = 40 Outcome measure : Anxiety level , Heart rate , blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Auricular Acupuncture Exam Anxiety Medical Students
DOC.criteria: 1 . Medical student University Greifswald 2 . Going take part oral exam human anatomy 3 . Participants without previous anxiolytic medication 4 . Participants without experience acupuncture 5 . Patients give write informed consent 1 . Local auricular skin infection 2 . Pregnant lactate woman 3 . Participants prosthetic damage cardiac valve , intracardiac intravascular shunt , hypertrophic cardiomyopathy mitral valve prolapse ( risk bacterial endocarditis accord guideline AHA ) 4 . Participants unable understand consent form 5 . History psychiatric disease , alcohol drug abuse
